data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 1, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paranaense drives forward and Geuvanio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Paranaense.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Paranaense.
Ramiro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Corinthians.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Corinthians a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Savio Pereira Sampaio waits before resuming play because Leo Natel for Corinthians is still down.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
In the minute 18, Leo Natel for Corinthians is back on the field again.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Paranaense throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Corinthians.
Savio Pereira Sampaio blows against Corinthians's Ramiro for offside.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Corinthians.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 26, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Paranaense.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 35, Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Paranaense.
Corinthians's Ramiro attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Corinthians close to the penalty box.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Ramiro (Corinthians) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 41, Corinthians's Ederson gets in a shot on goal at Arena da Baixada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ederson for Corinthians gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Paranaense's Fabinho is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Erick (Paranaense) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ramiro for Corinthians who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The second-half is underway in Curitiba.
In the minute 46, Ramiro is back on his feet again.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Eduardo Maciel de Barros (Paranaense) is making a first substitution, with Ravanelli replacing Leo Cittadini.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Ramiro (Corinthians) gets booked by Savio Pereira Sampaio, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Paranaense throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In Curitiba Paranaense drive forward through Leo Cittadini. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 51, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paranaense pushes forward through Vinicius Abner, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Paranaense's Christian misses with an attempt on goal.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Mateus Vital is booked for the away team.
Geuvanio for Paranaense drives towards goal at Arena da Baixada. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
In the minute 58, Corinthians are pushing forward but Ramiro's finish is wide of the goal.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Curitiba to check on Jo, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Jo, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Mauro Boselli is the substitute for Corinthians.
In the minute 63, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
The away team have replaced Leo Natel with Everaldo. This is the second substitution made today by Coelho.
Can Paranaense capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 65, Paranaense drive forward but Fabinho is judged offside.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena da Baixada.
Eduardo Maciel de Barros is making the team's second substitution at Arena da Baixada with Pedrinho replacing Fabinho.
In the minute 67, Guilherme Camacho is replacing Ederson for Corinthians at Arena da Baixada.
The away team replace Ramiro with Juan Cazares.
Vinicius Abner (Paranaense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 70, Throw-in Corinthians.
Fagner (Corinthians) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Paranaense a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Everaldo of Corinthians smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Renato Kayzer (Paranaense) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 76, Corinthians are down to 10 men after Bruno Mendez has been shown a red card.
Paranaense make their third substitution with Walter replacing Wellington.
Marllon is replacing Mateus Vital for the away team.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Arena da Baixada, Walter has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 86, Fagner (Corinthians) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 88, Joao Victor is replacing Vinicius Abner for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Eduardo Maciel de Barros (Paranaense) is making a fifth substitution, with Carlos Eduardo replacing Geuvanio.
Paranaense's Carlos Eduardo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Pedrinho (Paranaense) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
The match has come to a close in Curitiba. The final score is 0-1.
Everaldo scores to make it 0-1 at Arena da Baixada.
Joao Vitor Xavier de Almeida instrumental with a fine assist.
